Package com.clorabase.clorastore

Class Document

java.lang.Object
com.clorabase.clorastore.Document
public class Document extends Object
This class represent document in the database.

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(@NonNull String field, @NonNull Object value)
      Creates field in the existing document. Updates if already exist.
      Parameters:
      field - The name of the field
      value - The value of the field
      Throws:
      ClorastoreException - There are Many possibilities, Some are :- 1) When value is not a valid datatype 2) When an IO exception occurred 3) When document does not exist

    • setData

      public void setData(@NonNull Map<String,?> fields)
      Creates field in the document. Creates document if not already exist. This will overwrite previously written data the document
      Parameters:
      fields - The data to store in the document
      Throws:
      ClorastoreException - If fields contain a value that is not a valid datatype or if an IO error occurred.

    • getData

      @Nullable public Map<String,? super Object> getData()
      Returns the fields and their values present in the document in the form of Map
      Returns:
      a Map containing fields name as String and values as object,null if document is empty.

    • getObject

      public Object getObject(@NonNull String name, Class<?> clazz)
      Gets the POJO from the document.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the POJO
      Returns:
      Object that can be casted to your POJO class.

    • setObject

      public void setObject(@NonNull String name, @NonNull Object object)
      Inserts a POJO into the document.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the pojo
      object - The POJO

    • delete

      public void delete()
      Deletes the document. Any operation performed on this document after deleting this may cause FileNotFoundException. This should be last call on this document.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gets the name of the document. Usefully when document is returned by the query.
      Returns:
      Name of the document with .doc as extension.
